passives.name: Covering Fire
passives.effects: While your ally is within {{tt|1200 units|center-to-edge}}, your basic attacks [[on-hit]] generate a stack of ''Covering Fire''. At 1 stack, your next basic attack consumes them all to cause your ally to fire a bolt at the target, dealing {{as|{{pp|50 to 100}} physical damage}} and applying your ally's on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
